description: Try our easy to follow Slow-roasted tomatoes & capsicum with thyme recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High fibre,Low kilojoule,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Slow-roasted tomatoes & capsicum with thyme Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue with roasting hood on low heat. Line a roasting pan with baking paper.
Remove seeds and thickly slice. Halve tomatoes. Cut onion into 8 wedges. Place vegetables in the prepared roasting pan.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with fresh thyme leaves and season well with salt and pepper.
Place pan on barbeque and cover with lid. Cook for 50 minutes, tossing occasionally, or until vegetables are tender.
Transfer to a serving platter. Drizzle with a little extra olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with extra thyme leaves and serve.
